scripts.build:jekyll: rm -r docs && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.draft: npm run build:jekyll:drafts && clear && bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload --incremental --drafts
scripts.write: npm run build:jekyll && clear && bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload --incremental
scripts.minify: npx tailwindcss -i docs/assets/css/cv-screen.css -o docs/assets/css/cv-screen.css --minify && npx tailwindcss -i docs/assets/css/cv-print.css -o docs/assets/css/cv-print.css --minify && npx tailwindcss -i docs/assets/css/tailwind.css -o docs/assets/css/tailwind.css --minify
scripts.build: npm run build:jekyll && npm run minify && touch docs/.nojekyll
